topics.body:
So my bro says to me, "Hey do you want to hang out after, I might have a couple people over and order pizza, or if not we can just play Monster Hunter online"

I decide that I don't really feel like going out, but I will play Monster Hunter with him

And now my parents are making me feel guilty, because since I don't hang out with my brother that much, he thinks that I don't like him, and my mom thinks I need to get out once in a while

And now I feel like shit
